item.title: inSilecoMisc 0.4.0 (part 1/2)
item.description: inSilecoMisc inSilecoMisc is an R ðŸ“¦ I have been maintaining for four years now. It was originally designed as a convenient way to share handy functions. Instead of stacking them in my .Rprofile, I created a package and made it available on GitHub. inSilecoMisc is therefore a set of miscellaneous functions, just as other R packages (e.g. Hmisc) but as I frequently change its API, it is meant to stay in the experimental stage!
